targetLine.text: I’m sorry. I didn’t mean to interrupt things. He isn’t a good swimmer. I just think it’s a little too soon for him to be out here unsupervised.

contextBefore.text: nothing to see. Gather, over there. Excuse me, is there anything I can do? I am a scientist, sir. Is there any problem?

contextAfter.text: Well, I can assure you, he’s quite safe with me.
Look, I’m sure he is. But you have a large class and he can get lost from sight if you’re not looking. I’m not saying you’re not looking...
Oh, my gosh! Nemo’s swimming out to sea!
